name: Pod without one of configured common labels is blocked
Deployment and its PodSpec without one of configured common labels is blocked
Deployment with label "app.kubernetes.io/name" and its PodSpec without one of configured common labels is blocked
Deployment without one of configured common labels and its PodSpec with label "app.kubernetes.io/name" is blocked
Deployment and PodSpec with label "app.kubernetes.io/name" is allowed
